description: Create a new log entry. Accepts CreateLogInput with level (required, enum: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL), logger (required, String), message (required, String), context (optional, JSON), performance (optional, JSON with duration, memory, etc.), error (optional, JSON with message, stack, code), userId (optional, UUID), requestId (optional, String), timestamp (optional, DateTime, defaults to now). Returns Log with id, level, logger, message, timestamp. Uses Lambda Logs API for centralized logging to MongoDB. Raises ForbiddenError (403) if not Admin.
graphql_operation: mutation CreateLog($input: CreateLogInput!) { admin { createLog(input: $input) { id level logger message timestamp } } }
